Clue: Small, yet mighty, in colonies they live.
Cute, independent, and purrs with love.
Australia's second-largest bird, an agile runner with a long neck and powerful legs.
A cunning, red-coated bandit of the forest.
Grazes in pastures, gives us dairy's delight.
Silent hunter of the night, with big, wise, and watchful eyes.
Man's best friend, loyal and true.
